channel.title: A Timeline Project
channel.description: Maybe trying to open one open door !!! But I would find interesting to make a Timeline object to trig events in function of time. From few seconds to minutes long ( 10-20' ). I imagine it would be possible to record a curve in a table object by moving a fader. In a second time a trig would launch this table and send Midi data as output. Several tables could be affected to various Midi data. Here a little scheme of what I mean. Maybe this exists already… What do you think about that ?

item.title: A Timeline Project
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

I’m sure there are a few objects doing similar in the community library
My automate object does something like this.
( and can be used for very long time sequences as its not just recording data values could continuously)

Read full topic

item.title: A Timeline Project
item.dc:creator: @clerphil Philippe Clérin
item.description:
@clerphil wrote:

Maybe trying to open one open door !!!
But I would find interesting to make a Timeline object to trig events in function of time.
From few seconds to minutes long ( 10-20' ).
I imagine it would be possible to record a curve in a table object by moving a fader.
In a second time a trig would launch this table and send Midi data as output.
Several tables could be affected to various Midi data.
Here a little scheme of what I mean.
Maybe this exists already…
What do you think about that ?
